name: Sweet Pop - Jellipop Match 3
description:
Addictive match-3 levels to collect jellipop, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting sweet world. What are you waiting for?

Help your friend to collect skill from the exciting challenges:
- Explore various world themes and play over more challenging levels.
- Clear stage missions with a given number of moves.
- Collect lots of sweet new looks to crush those in style

Do not miss your best score.
Thanks & Enjoy
